page.title: 03Staple Farm
page.content: Mr.Gibbons has a farm on the lower slopes of the{Quantocks.}It is called{Staple Farm}and is in{West Quantoxhead.On his farm there are 200 acres of{arable}land. He grows 90 acres of second grade wheat which eventualy goes for biscuits or animal feed. The other 110 acres are used for growing barley for malting. On the{grassland}on his farm he runs two flocks of sheep. He has one flock of old{Dorest Horn,}the other flock is pedigree{Hampshire Down.}This provides him with breeding ewes.He has a total of 200 breeding ewes which all lamb in December.He has a lambing unit close to the farmhouse and the lanbs stay there for three days. He has four{tractors,}a muck spreader and a crop spreader, a combine harvester which cost Â£40,000. He uses it six weeks a year.
